message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.DS, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes and analyzes an approach to accelerate the Sinkhorn and Greenkhorn algorithms for solving the entropic regularized optimal transport (OT) problems. This involves optimization and numerical analysis, which are relevant to the sub-categories of information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), numerical analysis (cs.NA), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CV).
